简体中文.title: 像素风图像照片转换
简体中文.introduction: 这是一款正在开发中的照片像素风转换应用，目标是经过一系列图像处理，得到可直接用于像素游戏开发或只需少量手动修改即可应用的素材。
简体中文.pixel_size_select: 选择处理后的像素大小

English.title: Photo to Pixel Art Converter
English.introduction: This is a Photo to Pixel Art Converter under development. The goal is to obtain assets after a series of image processing. They can be directly used in pixel game development or can be applied with only a small amount of manual modification.
English.pixel_size_select: Select the pixel size after processing
